vote.title: Authorize (1) the reappointment of Administrative Law Judge (ALJ), Karen R. Washington dba Karen Roberts Washington, Attorney at Law, for the period January 1, 2026 through September 30, 2027; (2) the appointment of Jody Gilzene, Claire Em Motivators, LLC, Chambers Legal PLLC, and Nicole N. Walker Owens, as Administrative Law Judges for the period October 1, 2025 through September 30, 2027, to hear employee appeals of terminations and demotions; and (3) contracts with each ALJ in the amount of $15,000.00 each - Total not to exceed $75,000.00 - Financing: General Fund (subject to appropriations)
